Was very much um moved by all the women that came to Washington women in Alaska uh jumped on last minute airplanes got on red eyes and got up

And I think that this is a reflection of the tribal edition of our of our politics and and the and the substitute of rage for argumentation you you really get the sense that no one any longer is trying to persuade anyone or to change anyone's mind
Or the goals seems to be judged to beat the other side of to make heads explode and I think that's been a culture that's been coming along time and it's really come to a head right now I'm at this particular moment and if you know it's very much a a a ... maybe you know a
